p: Policy and advocacy efforts are among the most essential areas where public health nurses can engage in addressing pandemics and climate change in the 21st century. Working with local, state, and national legislatures and governing bodies are important venues to bring concerns about climate change and its intersection with pandemic emergence and response. It is important to be aware key initiatives of global organizations such as the United Nations (UN) since they have also promulgated the UN Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) which include Goal 13 aimed at Climate Action.
